case.state: Never noticed there was poker here. Don't think I've ever made it past the bar.
I wouldn't mind spendin' a little time to win a game of strip poker!
Come on! Let's have a grand ol' time an' drink 'til our arms fall off!
By the looks of things, it's gonna take you a few more drinks than myself, but leave that all up to me!
I feel like I'm among my people!
Who's the stiff?
Hope none a' you are plannin' on draggin' down my good mood.
Sure! Didn't know servers were playin' here, but the more the merrier, I s'pose!
Jin, you remind me of someone back home. Wonder what that horrible flirt's up to?
5 bucks says the glasses guy is the first to run when things get real...
I gotta strange feelin' that me an' the staff girl ain't gonna be seein' eye to eye this game...
Whatever you say, ...strange haired girl.
Now that looks like a girl whose willin' ta get absolutely smashed!
(Somethin's not quite right about that gray one...)
Would you look at that: topside's gone and gotten all turvied. Gonna hang all like that this whole game?
(Not sure if I like the look of tall, dark, and scary over there...)
Heh. Hope your luck's better than last time, ~player~. Can't just keep losin' like that.
Lady luck's as fickle as any man... Then again, ~player~ I think you learned that lesson personally from our last game together.
Oh, I remember you. Couldn't even get me in the buff, could ya? Gonna try your luck again?
Well, well. Back again, I see. I'm sure you'll get me this time.
Come back for more, ~player~? Or did you just want to see my bits again?
Bloody shame about last time, innit? You get me all hot an' bothered, but I still got to pull out the win.
Last time wasn't so bad, eh ~player~? Both of us got a little somethin' out of it!
If this is gonna be like last time an' we aren't gonna win, ~player~, least you could do is join in on drinkin' with me.
Ha! Welcome back, ~player~! I'm more than ready to beat you this time 'round. Watch me.
S'pose the drink got to me last game. Guess we'll see where we end up for this one...
Oh, I remember you, ~player~. You were this close, weren't you?
Maybe we could go for a quick dip before we start up here, eh?
Is anyone gonna shut those blinds?
Wouldn't mind goin' in for a quick dip after I'm done creamin' you all.
Oi! Fuck off! I'm not standin' in the middle of the street for your entertainment. I'm doin' it for mine!
I'm absolutely about to raid that bar, so don't no one try an' stop me.
Would ya look at that, you got matching outfits!
We aren't going to have to deal with any hoity-toity nonsense, are we?
All men? Fine, fine, fine... But I ain't thrilled.
Not one lady? Not a one? I'll still play, but I will say we could be doin' better.
Startin' off in the buff, I see. I like your style.
Guess I only have to whoop two arses this game!
Just the three of us means less time to get to the good stuff!
I feel like there might be room at this table for one more person, but whatever...
Looks like it's just the four of us! Hope this means someone's a little more inclined to pick up our table's tab!
I'm already chompin' at the bit. Let's get going!
Gimme a new glass and I'll be all set to go!
Careful who you're dealin' with. I'm arena champ multiple times runnin'!
It's a ladies night out! Woo hoo!
Is it half off for ladies? 'Cause this place seems to be rakin' 'em in!
Makes Syrenne act more aggressive with the player.
No cards, but you could top me off.
I'll just use these ones, thanks.
Just the one, thanks.
I'm just one card away from beatin' you all!
Utter rubbish. All new ones.
Just swap 'em all out.
Uh... nah... no cards...
Eh... These are fiiiine...
Uuuhhhh... One?
The one... thanks, love.
Just... I dunno. Take 'em all.
Uuuh... all five?
Hit me up with ~cards.text~ cards!
That'll be ~cards.text~ cards for me!
I'll take ~cards.text~ cards and another pint.
I dunno... ~cards.text~ cards?
Oi, ~cards.text~ cards! Give 'em 'ere!
Uh... I dunno... ~cards~?
*hic* Heh heh... ~cards~...
Uh... sch-even cards?
I know you've been clamorin'. Not my fault I'm pretty dead good at this game.
Still not gonna lose!
And my streak continues!
Well that last plan went tits up, but I've got a better feelin' on this one.
Alright! I'd like ta see some more of this!
I'll drink to that. 'Course I woulda done that without a good hand.
There's nothin' to worry about this round!
You best believe that I'm thrilled to get this hand.
I guess I'm workin' my way down easy street with these cards.
Looks like I've got five tickets for a ship headin' towards victory!
What the hell do you think you're doin', tryin' ta beat me this round?
I don't see any chips around here, so I'll take my winnings for this round in cash.
Just another victory of many!
Feels good. It's almost therapeutic.
I'll just roll on to the next round, please and thank you.
If we do gotta see someone strip, I'd say... ~player~ is my top pick.
Now I am a bettin' gal, so I say you've got 10 to 1 odds against me. Care to press your luck?
Ugh. Why can't I get hands like this when I'm playing for cash?
Cards are always nice to have durin' down time. Can't all be slayin' monsters an' savin' princesses, y'know?
You're all pretty good, but I've been up against spiders the size of houses, so this is nothin'.
Funny thing about drinkin': I don't know when I've had enough, but I definitely know when I've had to much!
If it’s getting too hot in here for any of you, I’m sure we can help with that.
Lemme get a few more good hits in.
Probably could've used this a lot earlier.
Ha ha! Just try an' knock me down. Just try!
How's it feel losin' to me?
Just make sure to write out my tab to Zael. I'm sure he'd love to cover for me.
I'd like my winnin's in cash, but I'll take applause if yer short.
No sense in not tryin' to have a fun time while I kick your arses!
I'm not drunk, yet! Not for lack a' tryin', though.
What's wrong there? You ain't gonna stand a chance? That it? Eh?
The drink helps you have good times, but it's shite at helpin' you remember them.
You all think too much. Just change yer cards an' try to mess up less.
Don't s'pose anyone'll want to share a celebratory drink with me?
I gotta find new ways to get people to buy me booze. There's only so many "I'll treat next times" people will take before they get suspicious.
Sorry, but I ain't in a losin' mood today. Maybe next time, love.
Told you all I was good at poker... least I think I did.
Mark my words! I'm not gonna be losin' anymore!
Ugh. I'm bored... I thought this place was supposed to pose as a challenge?
If I can still fight at the Arena while tipsy, I can sure as 'ell take you all on. Bring it!
I'm thinkin'... I'm thinkin'... erm... ugh... too drunk for this.
I think I've gotten them all hot an' bothered. Shame, really.
Heh heh... haaaaaa... Look who's gonna wiiiiin...
Ish like a fight... *hic* ha ha... caursh I win those... too.
Word to the wise... ha ha... Date busty barmaids. They fill yer heart, yer hand, and yer glass!
Seems an awkward time but... Even after I joined up with the mercenaries I didn't get too many chances to spend a day 100% stress free. So... this is real nice, bein' here. Thanks.
...And I’m back in it! Let’s tangle!
Now that that's out of the way, I can get back to kickin' your arses!
I think you'll find that I get up pretty easy after I get knocked down!
Honestly, I'm just used to being naked at this point.
Still hangin' in there!
You finally gonna try and beat me?
I may be naked, but there's no way I'm goin' down now!
I ain't lost in a while. 'Ow about a rear shot ta spice things up a bit?
Feel free to jump in anytime, ~player~.
So, how're we gonna deal with these?
Wouldn't you like to know about my hand? Well, my lips are sealed.
I wouldn't worry about ~player~. A bit of a blockhead, but it just takes 'em a while longer to swap cards is all.
Cards schmards. Just let me swing a sword around and enjoy the odd drink, that's all I need.
Oh man! Tonight, I think I'm gonna drink 'til my arms fall off!
Could be better, I suppose... But frettin' 'bout it ain't worth the effort.
Just wait for when I get real fired up!
I can't win the game with somethin' this bloody mediocre...
It's actually pretty hard puttin' an ensemble together when your flat broke. Nice I happened on all this leather strap apparel, innit?
I am gonna warn ya that I have gone and drunk an' entire bar dry. ...On a couple occasions.
Ever wonder how ya get involved in this type a' racket? Like, what makes ya think to host games a' strip poker in the first place?
Kinda thought there'd be money involved. S'pose spendin' most a' what I had on beer wasn't the brightest thing, innit?
Ugh, you've got me caught up in strategy. Whatever happened to lettin' the cards fall where they may?
I should ask Lowell for advice on cards. He'd be all cheeky about it an' flirt the whole time but it might be worth it to learn a thing or three.
Cards are a pretty universal language. No matter where I'd go as a mercenary, there'd be some pompous bloke up for a game. Typically his cards would say to him "you're bloody trash at this."
Never drink without a purpose. 'Course that purpose can be as simple as "I wanna be drunk". Whatever works.
S'pose I should let you know. I pregamed a lot before this. So, I'm not comin' in here all that high and dry.
Bein' a mercenary has led me to all sorts of different places that sell beer, and I gotta say that this is definitely one of 'em...
I've definitely had better.
I'll blow this round if anyone wants to pick up my tab!
How's about we just arm wrestle for it?
What, you think I'm drunk? Look, I'm as sober as... whatever's normally sober.
You can start weepin' anytime you want!
You can bug off right now if you think I'm foldin'!
I ain't never surrendered, I ain't never sat back, an' I don't plan on startin' anytime soon!
My mates tried ta convince me I was a master poker player, but only while completely smashed. Took a few empty coin purses 'fore I figured it out.
Well... someone's gonna end up naked. Maybe it wouldn't be the worst thing if it was me...
Now, how can people tell me I wear me heart on my sleeve? I don't even 'ave sleeves...
Sounds like we may be dealin' with some funny business and trickster talk... I don't like it.
If my mates could see me now...
Beer always tastes the best when you can't taste it anymore...
My mates could never really beat me at cards, 'cept Lowell. Well, not anymore, at least. Plus, now I know how to spot a cheater!
Ever flipped a table while playin' cards? It's bloody fun 'til they make you bend over to pick 'em up.
If I can walk outta this place still standin', then I'm goin' to Ariela's. Victory drinks for winners only, though.
After such a long and hard game... I just want somethin' soft an' warm.
Heh heh... Gotta warn ya. When I get like this I tend to play rough.
Oh, don't worry about *hic* me losing. I can take it. I've never been given somethin' that was too hard to swallow.
Know the problem with drinkin' too much? It makes you very, very thirsty.
I could go for some meat right now... Just a big ol' piece of meat to stuff my face with.
Uh... so there's this thing, called a "Kraken". Hard to fight, but I was just thinkin' that it's got these long tentacles an' well... um... What was I talkin' about?
Well, it was fun while it lasted...
There goes my beautiful, beautiful streak...
Guess it's time to put my money where my mouth is.
There you go again, threatnin' me with a good time.
Ugh. Somebody up there hates me.
This hand's worse than some of the things I've trodden in.
I don't think the word "stinks" properly expresses what a disgraceful, disgusting, putrid mess of a hand this is.
What? I suppose the cards want a little peek at me too.
Is this what I get for not putting my boat ticket up on the wall at the tavern? Damn superstitions.
Well this is a mighty fine situation...
I better not be playing with cheaters…
I did not order this hand on the rocks.
Guess I better fall back on the age-old tactic: bluff like crazy!
For the love of... I better get a free refill after this...
Am I wearing anything under these shorts? Guess you'll have to find out.
But I had such high hopes for seeing one of you strip...
I can bluff... Can bluff as well as any a' you can, anyways.
I'm bored already. Can we just skip this formal introduction stuff?
Damn. Think I'd catch a break one of these days...
I'm kinda hungry... There any food 'round here? Haven't had anythin' all day.
I'm starvin'... Don't even have good cards to distract me neither...
Nobody do anything stupid now. ~player~...
Beer is a lot like stupid pick up lines: there's always more than you can stomach...
Ugh… that’s well grim…
Welp, this hand's dead in the water. I'd ask for a necromancer, but I'm pretty sure I killed the only one I know...
Guess there are worse things than losin' a hand in poker. Ever fought a Muruk? Nasty things.
Dagran, strategist that he was, always said to have an extra card up your sleeve. See how well that advice worked out for me. I didn't even remember the sleeves.
Dagran always said to never reveal your hand early. Well he ain't here, so I'm free to say that this hand is utter shite.
They serve better beer here than at Ariela's. THough it ain't a high bar to clear, anyways...
You're gonna regret the day you crossed me!
I hope that card I traded actually was a six. It's gettin' hard to tell...
Oh, bloody hell it's cold here. Could we just get to where I lose this hand?
What the hell!
Think I'm gonna back down now?
Haven't slipped up this much since Zael found out he could launch banana peels with his crossbow...
Umm... maybe I shouldn't've had that last *hic* drink...
The chips might be down, but that's never stopped me before!
Might be closer to losin' than I thought...
Good news, ~player~. All those pervy thoughts you've been havin' might just come true.

Sometimes I ask myself how I end up in situations like this.
...Beer is usually the answer.
Nothin' wrong with havin' a little drink to forget yer troubles... Bad hand, bad night, bad life...
Yer just lucky I was never much of an angry drunk!
Cards are more fun when you got a better shot at winnin'. My mate Mirania can't lie worth a damn... Wish I'd dragged her along.
Anyone who says cards're like a battle or a war is bloody daft. I've been in both an' they're a lot less of a good time.
Eugh. I feel like I'm puttin' on a few, here. I'll have Mirania's body soon enough... I mean, she looks great, but I don't work my arse off all day to still have some stomach pudge.
Think you'll finally see my knockers, ~player~? Not this century!
Eh. I've won rounds with worse. I'll be fine.
Well, thinking ahead was never my strong suit. But I might still have a chance.
I'm not losin' my bra yet! You watch me!
There ain't a chance in hell that I'm losin'. Doesn't matter how shit these cards are.
Y'know, if I didn't plan on takin' a few lumps in this game, I wouldn't've started drinkin'.
Remind me not to bet money from now on... I wouldn't be good for it anyways.
Maybe I should stop drinkin' for a bit... Nah. Why should I listen to me? I'm drunk!
How's about a chat instead? Can't really focus if the girls are out.
To fulfill the dreams of many a man who got their arse kicked...
Figured I'd have to let my ladies go sometime.
This bra's already been through 'ell. Just a few close shaves an' bam! Straps get cut.
Usually, I'd expect dinner first.
Ah, losing's just another bad memory. Nothin' a few more drinks can't solve.
Welp. Can't say I wasn't hangin' on 'til the... *hic* very last bit!
I came fully prepared to beat all your arses. Tits out and all!
Lucky I was achin' ta... sort myself out anyways.
Ugh... I'm too hot to be poor and losing at poker...
Mph... I'm all hot an' bothered over here. I need to fight a Wyrm or a few Reptids. Somethin' to blow off some steam!
Looks like the real game's just startin'! Count me in, Mulan!
Absolutely love the attitude, but I'm already way ahead of you. But if you're payin', I'll probably have a brandy after this one.
It'll take more than say... ~marker.drinks~ of these, before I'm stepping near that!
I think I might've actually overdone my boozin' this time. ...ergh... A tiny Chihiro in a small box. ...Alright.
I'm not usually like this with men, but most guys I know wouldn't've come back. I think you already know all ya need about strength, Chihiro.

Saki, the numba of books I've read is single digits, I've been headbutter and headbutted dozens of times, and my senses are duller than an antique knife from years a' drinkin', but even I saw that comin'!
No... it's all alright... Never could rightly trust someone who don't drink though...
Always worth the try...
Though you have to admit... it is a little funny... Ha ha!

A "great" mercenary? Depends. If I was hirin', then it'd be the person who'd do what I pay them for, regardless of morals and some such. But I ain't. So I guess you gotta ask why do you wanna be "great"?
Yeah, that ain't bad; it rolls off the tongue. Though I think titles are earned, innit? You go out and let the world name you after you do something worth talkin' about.
Damn. What've you got that I ain't got, Leonie? What'd you tell 'em to drag 'em here?
I always think it's worth the ask. If you don't know your mates enough to get 'em to come along with you, do ya even really know 'em?
Blimey! It's a talker, too!
Let's see... We've done vampires an' smugglers, so fightin's no problem. Also, we've already rescued one princess, so what's one or two more?
(The bleedin' hell is an "NPC"?)
I look like the type to have written a damn thing in my life?
I'd tell ya about that, Futaba, but ya called me a "NPC" again. Dunno what it means, but I ain't about ta take it lightly. Beat me, then maybe I'll reconsider.
I've certainly done the deed. First for a queen, then just for the dosh.
Don't worry, love. Just a little revenge for you lyin' an' actin' like a cunt.
Try askin' again after a coupla' more drinks an' we'll see where the night takes us, eh love?
S'pose it's only a minute odd of oil you'd be wastin', but I ain't made a' money. So, guess just dim 'em a bit for the mood an' such.
Y'know, I was thinkin' that this'd be a bit more on the light side a' things... Lot less pryin' into my personal life.
Simple. All depends on if he wants ta keep 'is nads attached to the rest a' 'im.
Honestly... 'aven't been really "seein'" anyone for a while... If I did... I don't think they'd mind it if I needed a little bit more than they'd want to give.
Ya mean those rubbish magazines I see stuffed under on a' my mate's mattress? Feh. Just pick up a floozy off the street if ya need it that much.
I'd say three. Once in the mornin', once after the day's battle, an' a little somethin' after I get plastered that night!
Position, eh? Nothin' quite like bein' on top of someone, ridin' 'em an' lookin' at their face tryin' ta hold for as long as they can.
Nah, mate. It's all an open book with me. Go on, Ask s'more questions!
Eh... it's all part of the game, innit? What's a lie every once in a while?
So long as they ain't mind my boozin', I ain't mind 'em takin' a puff!
Ain't got anything in the way of blood family. ...My mates are as close as I got an' I dunno what I'd do without 'em...
Finally pay off my bar tab for one! Gotta get outta my own line a' work 'cause I'd be set for life!
Doin' somethin' big an' daft is one thing, but tiny stuff ain't worth the sweat.
I ain't even been in 'ere five minutes an' they're already complainin'. Least wait for me to get plastered first.
Shoppin'? Yeah, time to time. Can never afford anything nice for myself, though. Mostly just essentials. Food, armor, supplies. The works.
Ah, don't let that get you down, Amy. Men are just like that. They flip an' flop like a fish on land. I say take it easy for a while, live your life. A little time and who knows?
Psh. Who do ya think? Put me down for my own win. We are playin' for cash, right?
Why play? 'Cause it's fuckin' fun, love! What better way to end a rough week than this?
...eh, I ain't really for the famous life. Have a drink, swing a sword... all I need really. Figure I'd get a big head about it, anyways.
That, love, depends entirely on my hangover. Prefer to keep my mornings open, anyways.

Nah, you're onto somethin', love. It's different between people, 'course. All got our pains. Should say I don't appreciate when people try for my mate's buttons. Good way to earn a swift kick to the head.
Friends are just the people that you trust. One's who always got yer back. Camaraderie and junk, get me?
Oh... um... Happy Birthday, then. What made you want to spend your "special" day here of all places?
A spouse? I think if you show up to this place askin' for a partner you'll get what you get. Nothin' else to it.
You're speakin' a bit of my language, Reimu. Never been one to say no to a little extra cash. How about I tell you my idea, but only if we go 60/40 split on the profits, eh?

Assumin' this ain't some smarmy way to get someone to say you, I dunno... There was this one night that I just saw the night sky lit up with fireworks same time as a meteor shower. Never seen anything else quite like it.
Well, well Miss Miku. MEIKO sounds like my kinda girl! I'd vouch for this place any day of the week if it meant more drinkin' buddies!

I'd say yer a pretty great friend then, Miku. I remember that I once got like that. Problem was that I still wanted more! My mates'd drag me from the bar only to have me stumble back over there a few minutes later!

Nah, I think you're on the money, Reimu. The good-looking, wealthy chaps all turn up to the local pubs only on days when I'm not there. I just get chatted up by the liars, cheaters, and pigs based on luck...

Alright, Remmy, how's this: Charge people for fake fortune telling. Tell 'em they'll get "an unexpected surprise" then dump water on 'em later. Just change it up each time. Keep chargin' more each time and we'll be swimmin' in cash!

How's this for get rich quick: You get people to bet money on adventurers completin' quests. I go to complete 'em an' do it flawlessly. Then, when the odds are sky high, you bet against me an' I take a "dive". Easy-peasy.
Alright, Darlin'. Guess I'll catch with ya at the baths. It'll be nice to get all wet.
Well, looks like there's still pervs out there... Stylish pervs, but pervs none the less...
Ugh... yeah, yeah. Magic powers would be good for fighting, but it sounds so boooring gettin' to that point. How'd you get your powers, Darlin'?
Yeah... Doin' this with your friends ain't for everyone. What d'ya do with yer mates instead, Darlin'?
Be honest, Darlin', not sure that I got half of that. So, they're still bad here, just in a different way. Fun!
Ugh... Street performing? Sorry love, but that's outta my wheelhouse. Less one a' my mates has been holdin' out on me, musically speakin'.
S'pose you ain't really all for a story then... More drinks for me then...
That's the catch, innit? He's one a' my mates. It's a banter an' all that, not just some guy.
You're all that, Darlin'? Trust you're judgment an' all, but a whole arena seems like a lotta ground to get covered for a single bird...
A hot spring? My cares'd melt in a second. Finding one where I tread is not short of a miracle. I was thinkin' a bathhouse but you can get me into a spring any day of the week!
Didn't make much sense to me either, Reimu. Just makes the clothes invisible. I think it's some damn prank bein' played.
It's complete shite is what it is. You get magic powers, my mate Yurick's got a stone eye thing that gives him powers... I'd like powers. It's not fair...
Bringin' your friends here, Reimu. If Mirania came here. See her reveal her soft, delicate skin. Her figure... probably with a bit of chub from eatin' a bit extra. Much to think about...
Can't just give yourself away like that, Reimu. No wonder yer in bloody need of cash, you've been workin' pro bono.

No opener, Reimu? It ain't foolproof, but a nice compliment an' speakin' your intent is one way to get you a spouse. Somethin' like... "I couldn't help but notice how quick you chugged that whole beer. Can I buy you a fresh one?".
Well What happened at Hawk-er-Land? Wherever. Figure out what you missed the first try an' the second try might leave you with riches to spare.
Damn... Maybe he is just bein' an arse. I should thank you, Reimu. I'll push that pretty boy over a bannister or somethin' when I see him again...
Well I'll be waitin' for you at the bath, Fina! That question almost never goes this well.
Can't you just feel it, Fina? The warm water. The deep scrub. The light steam. Makes me shudder a little.
That's the thing about this dye, Leonie, it's fabric dye. Only thing you'd get by puttin' it on is naked assassins.
Magic's real useful an' all that, Leonie, but learnin' it is still time I ain't got. Like, if it is that good, then why haven't you learned it?
Ah ha! That was some a' my language, Fireball. Hell yeah we can fight beasts! You got the coin we'll be on it!
Think you're right, Fireball. He's probably just bein' a dick. I'll make sure to give a retort when I see him again, knuckles first of course.
I think those we're that bad, Fireball! Straight forward and no funny business. I'd definitely go train with you.

I'm shite at darts myself but that's a nice story, Fireball! Reminds me of when I was havin' a fun night out an' there was this jerk at the bar cat callin' me. I went over there, lifted up him and his stool and launched 'em over the counter! Fun times.
Ooh, nice one, Reimu. Once did somethin' similar with my mate Yurick. It's amazing how much a piece of fabric on a fishin' line looks like a bat if you wave it around enough.
Damn, Reimu! You think you should be messin' around like that? I quite like the night, I get to sleep then.

Dunno what a "robot" is, but I once convinced this drunk guy to dress as a girl an' trick this skirt-chaser, Lowell. All fun an' games 'til we ripped the wig off. He still took 'em into the bedroom anyways...
Geez... Let that story be a reminder not to piss you off, Reimu. I don't get up from being push off of waterfalls that easy.
Yeah, you're alright ~player~, but that's not what I meant about your "mates", Fina. So what's this about Vyse, eh? Somethin' goin' on there?
You mean there's cheats, Fina! I'll take a moon stone, then. Where do you get 'em?
Engineering? Eh... nah, don't think that's anyone's speciality, Fina. If anyone knew about airships, they've been holdin' out on me.

A little rote, Fina but... what's with that anyways? Where do enemies even spend all of the cash they got on 'em? Probably just keep it in between putting it in random chests scattered 'round their lair...
Y'know, Fina, if you want a little invisible dye, I can get it for you. For a price.
...Yeah, you don't beat around the bush, Fina. You'd have to have a god's confidence if you wanted that to work.

Nah, Fina, that's real cute! My mate Calista is like that. She doesn't drink much, but when she does she always wants to dance with everyone. Even the dumbest joke will send her into fits when she's like that.
Funniest thing, Fina: I think it is that way. We're always on each other's nerves, but I think it's cause we care. I dunno... he he.
Question for the lot of ya: Is dye that makes clothes invisible a thing where you're from? Always seemed sorta... perverted.

Might as well ask... Right, learnin' magic is hard work an' requires a bloody lot of bookwork and years of trainin'. Ya can get some cool stuff, but it's really just for battlin'. You lot think that's worth it?

This kinda place ain't for everyone, but I'm havin' a rather grand time myself. Any of ya thinkin' about bringin' your best mates here? Take a proper amount of convincin' ta get 'em within a few blocks a' here.

Say you were a bit in the hole after a bad bet from some pretty boy who's got a cutely punchable face... Er... You just need to get some cash and on the quick end of things. How would you go about it?
Say, you lot got any odd jobs ya need done? Y'know, monsters killed, people rescued, or a touch beefier security? Promised I'd at least ask about it for my mates.
Okay... when someone's always up on ya, teasin' you and whatnot... Think that means they fancy you? Or are they just bein' an arse?
I feel like a nice, warm bath comin' my way. In fact, we should all get a bath... No problems with communal bathin' here, right?
I think we all know the best way to pass the time: drinkin' stories! C'mon, I think we all have a full-on bender in us. You say yours and I'll tell one a' mine.
Let's say there's someone you fancy an' you wanna get with her. What's your opener? Wanna see if the lines are only rotten where I'm from.
Gettin' into the thick of it, innit? So, what d'ya thinks gonna turn someone on more: sultry little pillow-talk or loud and wild screams of encouragement?
I checked out the bar an' most of 'em are just for show. Guess I'll be stickin' to my beer fa' this game.
We didn't have to pay to get in here, right? Y'see there was this back door and... yeah.
Hmmm... strippin' from the bottom goin' up, eh?
I think I've been given just the most devilish of an idea...
Can't help noticin' that there's only one guy here...
Ha ha! Nothin' like a bit of boozin' to get the party started! Let's see how hammered I'll get before I'm belly up in this game!
Win this hand. Win the game. Sounds like a plan.
Looks like it's all ridin' on this!
Bring it on! Nothin' a quick duel can't solve!
Say, we got any musicians here? I fancy a bit of music while we strip.
The bar's nothin' without a touch of music. Anyone rarin' to fulfill that request?
Ugh... this is just real, real nice... We're all havin' drinks and having a good time. Best I could ask for!
This place... I try takin' shots every time you all go an' whip somethin' out an' this is the thanks I get. Utter rubbish.
I can't believe this! How am I the only one showin' off their goods?
This place is bloody great! Yeah, I'm nude, but look at everybody else! Imma be plastered by the end a' this!
Hey, ~player~! Yer bein' kinda quiet! How's about givin' me a task ta do or somethin'? When I'm drunk enough I'll do anythin', an' I mean anythin'!
I think we're goin' along pretty well. Drinks definitely startin' ta hit me about now...
'Ow's this look? This'd be the image I'd wanna save for the ol' wank bank.
Are ya gettin' a good look in? I know you were tryin' ta get a sneaky-peak in anyways.
Beer's great an' all, but it's a downer sometimes. If I start gettin' all touchy-feely 'bout life or war or junk, could ya give me a nice smack to the head? Fair warning: might smack you back.
Do those drinks back there belong to somebody? Just wondering...
In case ya didn't get it, it's Syrenne. Pronouncin' it's as easy as takin' "Sir" an' "Ren" an' smushin' 'em together.
A pair can't save ya forever, I s'pose.
This is what I get for playing it safe...
Maybe I shoulda gone for somethin' riskier than a pair?
It's a lot nicer when you get drunk with others,
What are you all waiting on? Get drunk! Get shitfaced!
Drinkin' is really a social thing. What's the point of being wasted if you can't do it with the people you care about?
I gotta think my blood's at least 10% beer by this point. Maybe 12% after this glass.
I wish there was a better way to lose yourself when you come home from a job. For me, it's always been beer. Not the best tastin', but it's one of the cheapest ways, innit?
Y'know, most people aren't so nice to us mercenaries. Been tossed out on my bum so many times... You lot have been alright with me. Thanks...
If you really, really want to know who someone is, watch 'em when they get drunk. I think it says somethin' about what yer really about.
Kinda missin' my mates about now. Nothin' wrong with you lot but... there's something special with the people closest to you. Can't explain it.
Ever think about what you'd do if you got rich? I do. All the time. Thing is, though, I don't think I'd do anything different. Or maybe it'd change everything...
Am I gettin' all life-y and deep thoughts-y yet? I only hear about half the things I say...
You ever feel... stuck? Like, I've been killin' monsters an' all for years, but I ain't a step closer to every rich wanker who hires me... I dunno. I'm just a little sick of it.
It's nice to 'ave stuff like this to do, innit? Sometimes it's days or weeks between jobs. Lyin' around all the time just rots the brain.
How often do you get to do somethin' for yourself, y'know? Between doin' jobs for others an' helpin' out my friends, sometimes it feels like there's no time just for ol' Syrenne.
This feels weirdly slow... Granted, most free days I can find are spent at the arena but still...
More of you should try beer! Tastes like backwash but enough of 'em an' you'll be free of a day's worth of worries!
You wanna piece of me? Eh? Whole bloody world's wanted one a' those since day one, so you'll just have to get in line!

state.text: This line removes previously set markers about the state of the previous game ending.

case.state: Cheers, Ini. Imma mercenary by trade. S'pose a toned body just comes with the territory.
Really? You don't particularly strike me as a book-y type. Don't sound like it, neither.
I'm gettin' to it, triangle head. Just 'cause you suck at the game doesn't mean I have ta suffer for it.
We need to 'ave a chat, Ini? Did you not lose hard enough? A round with my hands an' your clit oughta be the stress relief ya need.
Wha... nobody's asked me about the army in ages... thought I'd downed enough drinks to pass away those thoughts...
Hmph. Little personal there, but no. There ain't anybody like that for me.
It's about time one of you gawkers noticed. It ain't easy keepin' it like this, for starters.
Well, we did track down this vampire a few days ago that was abductin' people. Found out one of my mates screams like a schoolgirl. Pretty good time, all in all.
Well, it was mostly that contract mumbo-jumbo until we got a gig working as security in a castle, under a count.
The fuck...? ...Uh, well, no. An' I've seen enough guys tryna make me bed 'em by doin' that, you'd think I'd 'ave an idea.
Ugh. I hate those places. I dunno, guess ...the sewers beneath the prison were an absolute rank mess. Felt my nose was about to leg it.
Well, I don't think we have enough people for me to show off my latest trick! No spoilers, but it involves three knives, a fire mage, and another ten mugs of the good stuff!
Bounty huntin'? Yeah, here an' there. There's bigger markets in protecting and assistin' armies, but you can't never be afraid to cut a bloke down if the pay's good.
Thank ya, love. I could say where I'm from, but I don't think it'd do ya any good. Doesn't exist anymore.
Now monster-punchin' I can get behind but P-PSI? I'm always shite at guessin' these things... Is it a fightin' style or something like that?
Lushness? This is about my knockers, innit?
I think I'll start this game out with the simple, obvious choice.
That I am. Me an' my mates are all mercenaries.
It's Syrenne, and I've been waitin' right at the bar. Always will be.
I was gonna do it anyways... but I'll fill out that tall buffoons request. Why not?
Sounds like some people who actually know how to party!
Y'know, somethin's tellin' me you might be right. ...It's probably the booze.
I'm a woman of many talents. Drinkin' this beer with one 'and and 'oldin' cards with the other just happens ta be one a' them!
It's just beer is all. Bottom shelf and tastes like gutter water, too. An winnin' would be nice, but I'm in need of a good time an' to me, that means bein' a few glasses deep.
Ooh. Flame Tribe. Quite like the sound of that.
I'll be honest, I kinda stopped with the whole countin' business after number four!
You daft? That's why I wear these damn belts in the first place, to keep these shits from falling. Why else would I wear them, eh?
This beer? There's a pretty simple explanation for that!
All that mumblin' to yerself an' lax sword discipline...I didn't know you could be so forward.
The shorts? Fat chance.
Got 'em done up at a local place. Whole mercenary gang's got matchin' ones, I s'pose these stand for unity or somethin' like that.
Ask away. They ain't goin' any place fast.
Well, then. Suppose I can't just be some kinda copycat, then, can I?
Afraid the bants'll have ta be picked up after removin' my trousers. Then us barmy, alcie lasses can get back to wafflin' on about how bang-tidy we both are.
Aw man... I think my beer's getting kinda warm... This sucks.
Magic, eh? Uh, each one a' them's got a specialty. Fire, leaf, holy, an' ice magic, ...Think that's right. Me? I never got into any a' that magic stuff. Too much readin'.
While I think you'd be a cute drunk, Akko, I'd say order somethin' light to ease yourself into it! Honestly, ya look like you'd black out after a daiquiri or two.
Glad I strike ya fancy, love. I'm always down fer a booze-up.
See, that's the thing, Rayvon, I ain't exactly liquid for the time bein'. Top shelf shite ain't in my reach, less you wanna be a real mate.
Yeah! Haha! I feel pumped right now!
Uh... maybe I should just put the booze down and try to concentrate. Make sure my brain is still sticky: don't wanna miss anything.
Ugh... I'm definitely starting to dip in an' out. Let me know if I start spillin'.
Hey! Hey! Rinkah! You gotta see this!
Ugh... I don't know, mates. I think this stuff's goin' straight to my hips.
Merc business, innit? Well, I say get a group that you can put your full faith in. Fighting next to those you can't trust just ends up being a war on two fronts.
These babies? Got this ink before I went to Lazulis. One a' my mates had 'em and said I should match. Quick chat with old clients an' you can usually get a read on how good a tat artist is.
If I can be on the level with ya, Cindy: No idea where that is. I've been around a lot, but I ain't been to a place called "Galar". Not yet, at least.
Can't land on me if it's too busy bein' drunk down, can it?
Yeah? Didn't think the name was that popular!
Damn. Compliments half-off at the market today or somethin'? But thanks...
Yeah. She swings around here once in a blue moon. Damn if my drink couldn't use a touch-up about now, though...
Yeah, yeah. I didn't think this winnin' steak would hold anyways, but thanks for the reminder from Heaven above...
Don't worry, Misato! I'll get a refill for my glass soon enough! Might just have to down this one first.
Me? I go where the money is. You can try an' stick to the villainous arseholes of the world, but it ain't always that cut and dry.
Ah you're just a worry-wart, Nami. I was once drunk enough to try rooftop acrobatics in my skivvies. Wasn't pretty, but I came out alright.
I more-or-less stumbled into any "heroing", but you ain't too far off. I'm a mercenary. More for the coin than a sense of duty, innit?
Freelance for the time. Workin' under Count Arganan currently. Why you need a merc or somethin'?
Three times in a row? You bastards...
Me again? Thought I'd do better than that.
Three times? You guys must really want me to lose. Fat chance.
Again? Should I start shakin' out your clothes to see if any spare cards fall out?
I'm not drunk enough to not notice three fuckin' losses in a row!
Sod off... buncha pricks... three losses in a row my arse...
After a week's worth of fightin' baddies an' such, I'm bloody ready to have a little fun here!
Huh. I ain't feel that ticked, really. I've done nothin' but workin' my arse off all week. So this is gonna be some nice time off.
Hmph. I guess I had to strip some time. Can't get to none a' the good stuff otherwise.
Me again, innit? Drink's startin' to make me slip. Swear I'm not this much of a lightweight normally.
So I drink a little too much, and I get a little easier to beat at cards... What of it?
You guys really want me to show some skin? I'll oblige.
Given how mercenaries are usually turned away at the door, I didn't think to say somethin' about you lettin' me play. So... thanks!
Alright, I'll strip. Could ya get your flirtin' outta the way this round? I'll let you off without any... well much ribbin'. Seems to help Lowell at least, the perv.
Now, how about a long chat? I'm sure that's what yer wantin' about now. Ha ha!
If I *hic* hadn't downed so much of this... you probably woulda gone home without seein' the real good stuff.
Aw... you ain't think I'm bein' a tease, are ya? Think I should fix that?
Have it on good authority that everyone wants somethin'. Now... what could a group who signed up for strip poker want outta me?
Nothin' to worry over... I've been sharin' a room for a loooong while now.
I'm sure you'll be callin' all your best mates to see this, ~player~.
Figures. You all 'ave been starin' at my bits soon as I took my top off.
Damn. Thought you all liked me bein' a tease.
Oh no, I'm more than happy to... by your command...
Think we're clever, eh?
Don’t try and hide that smile, you lot, I can still see it!
Alright, I'm going. Keep your shirts on if you've still got one.
Yer all just lucky that I usually show up to places a little bit tipsy, tonight included, of course.
Attention's on me, innit? Guess I should lead by sayin' I ain't drunk enough for dates yet. Wait a bit an' we'll see about anyone tryin' ta make a move.
You should know I ain't go down easy. I'm goin' down blazin' like a shot of good whiskey!
I ain't dancin' drunk on tables just yet but here goes tryin' to strip.
Aw shit... Broke my concentration. Whatever I was thinkin' about, if it was worth rememberin', I'll remember it tomorrow.
Oh, you're a greedy lot, ain't-cha? Never was one to turn somethin' down for my mates. And you're all my mates, right?
Drink's makin' me all woozy... I'll let you know if I start seein' things... strange lights, glowin' tigers, more than one a' me... the usual.

Ugh... I bet my mate Yurick 50 gold coins that I'd be able to win this game without strippin' my shorts. I shoulda set my standards lower... He didn't even wanna make the bet: I just wanted to squeeze 50 coins outta him.
I think I can take a loss in stride. Can't win every match at the arena, though I do get pretty close.
What? No heartfelt pleas to strip in my place? Fiiiine You're such a killjoy.
I can tangle. Who's with me? Shot for shot! Clothing for clothing! C'mon!
Had to happen, eh? Well, it's all outsiders an' insiders anyway. Learn that from bein' in the dregs for so long.
Me? Alright, then. Losin' ain't bad, really. I think some people don't know how to have fun with things anymore. Our stick in the mud is named Dagran, but they can come from anywhere really.
I think I've been hangin' out with Calista too much. All that time with a princess'll make you softer than freshly lotioned skin.
I'm glad someone is enjoyin' me tryin' ta be a little unconventional!
Honestly, I'm just gettin' a little hot. Plus, can't start off without showin' off a little, eh?
We're mostly in the line for contract work, but weird stuff ain't outta the question. Fought a mirror double once, too. Though I think it was a little bit different than that.
Well yeah, but ghosts n' shit? You talk like we'd have to explain that ya dog went to a great big farm in the sky.
The bloody 'ell does that mean!
The drink ain't what's important here! I'm gonna have ta go bottoms up!
Fake? You of all people are not the person to criticize for bein' fake..
Ya seem nervous, Ini. Just admit that you lost, just so you could rub off to me. Ya just couldn't hold it back any longer...
Maybe I even woulda won your challenge. Guess we'll never know.
Who knows? Maybe you would've won your own challenge?
I mean... well yes... I was in the army, but I haven't been part since... well since all the men turned tail and left the rest of us to... to...
HEY! Listen you orange gremlin, who the bloody hell is tellin' you about Lowe- ...About my personal life.
Sure. Meet other mercs all the time. They just don't got what my mates an' I got, is all.
Well, turns out that one of the Lords there was a closet perv and was peerin' in on the princess.
I wish I could spend that much, but that'd cut into my boozin' money an' I won't be havin' that. ...Hmmm. Yeah, I don't see the harm if you wanna come in for a touch.
Ugh... these fuckin' pricks. Like this one chap with the fuckin' balls to try to whip it out durin' a rescue! I woulda had him out cold if I was a tad more drunk at the time.
S'pose I'm constantly goin' from one grimy place to another, so I get the feelin'.
I mean, it's really all in the hips. Good enough rotation and you'll send even the toughest of lads cryin' back to their mums!
Eh it's alright, long time ago... But I mean, sometimes ya gotta be direct with things. Words, strippin'. Come out strong!
Sorry, love, still way off. The place where I'm from ain't around anymore. I've been goin' here an' there ever since.
Shame then. People tell me I'm even better at ...conversation... when they're drunk.
That simple choice bein' my top, a' course.
Yeah? Bet they just lack my charmin' personality and roguish good looks.
Can't start out bein' a coward. Now, can ya?
I'm always a little drunk. Can't be helped.
I'm gettin' to it. Can't believe I'm sayin' this, but slow down for a sec.
I am a woman of many strengths. Maybe I could even do both at once?
Aww... No love for bein' a strappin' young lass? Shame.
Well, I hope that yours are a lot less annoying to take off than these bloody things...
Simple, really. 'Sides the sex appeal, they hold up bits of armor if I needed it. But I s'pose that's not needed 'ere.
I'm takin' 'em all off. It's gotta be all of nothin'!
You... and everyone else I've had the pleasure of giving a sharp kick to.
Y'see, whenever you look down at ya cards or everyone's focused on someone strippin', a barmaid sneaks by to take my drink an' give me a refill. It's standard for heavy drinkers, such as myself.
Don't be like that. Everyone'd get it if we went off for a quickie.
My mates actually have a bettin' game to see how much I remember after gettin' plastered! Game ends when I realize that they're playin'!
Yeah, well... I was thinking I might as well take my socks off as well... just for the hell of it.
These? These are just my trousers. Normal pants back on Lazulis.
Got 'em for joinin' the mercenaries. We've all got 'em. ...Never did ask Dagran what they stood for.
You'd think that, Zone-y. But there's more here than meets the eye...
Oh... you'll see, Kamina.
Alright! Let's get these shorts on the ground!
I'm goin'! I'm goin'! Just a fan of the cheers, is all.
"Keep my brain sticky". Well I never was good with words and the like...
Woo... worn the elastic a bit thin on these ones. Hasn't snapped or nothin', so I'm all good though.
...Haha. It's my muff.
You aren't that hot, Sei... Let's not get ahead of ourselves here.
Though if I finish it... I might just be drunk enough for a nice strip show.
My my, Sei. Aren't we being eager?
Let's not get impatient, now. I've still gotta have a little fun here and there.
Never 'eard of tattoo magic... More you know, I s'pose.
Spur a' the moment idea? ...I'm listenin'...
Just keeps m'self from bein' scuffed up, so I can take 'em on an' off ta just wear shorts. Simple stuff, really.
It ain't, Witch-y. Gotta take 'em off if I ever want to get to the part where I start slickin'.
Never been much a' a bookie. An' I sometimes wake up from bein' blacked out with more stuff in my room than before, if that answers ya question.
Yeah, it hurt, but it was for my mates. So, completely worth it.
Look. I ain't like gettin' kicked outta places. Place gives ya the boot for dirtyin' everythin', ya start ta hold a grudge. Understand?
How'd ya figure?
Well, thanks! Yer a tart yerself!
...Time to time? Not sure that's how these things work...
Keeps me from offendin' those posh knobheads in the castle back home with the sight of my bare ankles.
The point for keepin' 'em apart is so... It's that... errr...
Yeah... maybe you are right. It's... kinda a dumb outfit...
Well, then. I'll try an' make this one feel just as excitin'!
Ain't the worst thing that could happen. One time, I tried bringin' a table's worth of ales to my mates. Smacked into this one bloke and crash, nothin' but spilt dreams.
Ah, the odd jobs. Sometimes the weird shit is the best. Find ten frogs, distract this boy, trip a few nobles. How 'bout you all? Any fun ones?
I'm all hot an' sweaty... Hope you don't mind a little skin.
Figure I should start big. I know I never like to be kept waiting.
Don't know how my mates can get into wearin' sleeves while out an' about. I'm already sweatin' through my top!
Y'know I never really had a "strap" aesthetic in mind. Sorta just came with gettin' clothes where you can.
It's nice to be in a place like this, innit? No one breathin' down yer neck or tellin' ya to scram 'cause you "drank all the booze". Real nice.
Sometimes it's just about havin' the right pick-me-up. I consider myself somethin' of an expert in gettin' people just the right amount of motivated.
One a' the nice things about bein' a mercenary is that you get to wear what you want, pretty much. No one's expectin' you to dress all fancy or wear the same thing like if we were knights.
I sorta wish my mates were here. This ain't their thing, really, but I think they could use a break now an' again.
Look at that! Still have the scuff from that time my mate Lowell was bein' a twat who needed a solid knock in just the right place.
Sorta weird bein' here without my mates. They're the sort that you do everything with. Eat, fight, bathe, sleep...
Y'know I've tried to drink while strippin' at the same time. Goes down about as well as you'd expect...

Funny enough, I only got these things after doin' jobs for some posh pricks. Lady a' the house didn't like seein' my legs an' I couldn't afford new trousers. In any case, I come home with a lot less scrapes that I did.
Make sure you're all enjoyin' yourselves! It's like that one sayin': "Eat, drink, and be merry for tomorrow... something, something..." Point still stands.
Back at the arena there's none of this fuddy-duddy waitin' to be had. One snap an' yer naked, sweaty, an' handing out congratulations.
S'pose we can't all be winners here. Least, not until the foreplay's done.
Point of all this is to have a good time. Enjoy life and all that. But if you ain't havin' fun yet, I s'pose I'll just have to make things a little more fun myself.
Did I mix you up? Variety's the spice a' life.
Lookie there... a little muff all nice an' done up. What're we to do about that?
Ah dear... my little haze has me all topsy-turvy, innit? Guess it'll be a touch before you see my knockers.
Heheh... There's a reason I wanted to save my lovelies for last...
Don't worry... I don't *hic* mind the attention.
Heheh... by those looks I'd think you fancied me or somethin'.
Oh. I'm sorry. I didn't know my drink holdin' skills weren't up to par! How fuckin' foolish of me!
Wish I'd thought of goin' bra first. That'd really drive people up the wall!
Hell yeah! Vampires, zombies, necromancers, the whole shebang! Name it, we've killed it!
Yeah... wow...
I suppose you'll have to beat me and find that out for yourself.
I suppose you'll have to hope someone beats me so you can find out for yourself.
You can right proper fuck off if you think I'm gonna take that without rippin' ya a new one!
Yeah... you might be right for once, Ini... A new drink, barman.
Sod off, ya cunt. Yer not gonna get yer grubby mitts on my tits 'til I've sat you over my knee and taught you a good, strong lesson!
Nah, I'm just funnin' ya. But cheers! They are certainly a sight, ain't they!
Strange little gremlin girl.
That just made it easier for the lot of us. Not that I mind...
Guess I lost! My greatest night drinkin' was me an' my mate Mirania. Every muffin she ate, I took a shot. Bakery, pub, an' bedroom were all closed for two days straight!
You gotta lotta nerve tryn' to dredge up those memories...
Mmmm... (Great. Now I'm all flustered about him. Dammit, Lowell. If you were here, stripping...)
Heh. I'm always down for a natter. Long as booze is involved, that is.
That's nothin'. Turns out that maids are huge gossips... if you can push all the right buttons.
Too bad Mirania can't be here to hear that! All those baths together 'ave been worth it!
I suppose you might be onto something...
Ain't no idea who you're talkin' to, but ...what's this talk about your feet...
I knew it! Booze is good for the soul!
Now, do ya think the lot of you can hold back on bellyachin' when I gotta remove the less excitin' shite?
Thanks... (Was that a compliment or a straight dig at her own world?)
I've never been one to turn down the chance to 'ave a drink, but lemme down a few more a' these 'fore we get into it!
I'm glad someone 'ere appreciates what I'm gettin' at!
I guess. Well... my whole team's got these ones. Doubt you're that coordinated.
Do you go doubtin' me just yet! I'll take 'er down with a drink in hand.
Fuck yeah! Sounds like a hell of a good time!
Thanks. Now, let's see what I can do now that I ain't so... restricted.
That's the attitude, Zoney! Took off my gloves as a little sign a' appreciation.
The hell? Drills work through spinnin' an' shit. What's nudity even got to... Aw hell. Just whatever.
...Or maybe it's just magic bollocks.
If we're bein' gracious now, I'd appreciate somethin' posh. Martini, with lots of olive oil.
I'm tryin' ta think about how many drinks I've had since I got here... Gotta be at least ~marker.drinks~...
Well I doubt she could pull it off as well as I can.
Ask me, yer a right mess of things. Maybe give all that a once over before questionin' about how my pants work, yeah?
Think so, Zone-y? Been tryin' to get them toned for a while. Good to see it's all payin' off!
Ha ha, yeah, I was just fuckin' with ya. It's basically a clean slate.
What? I'm just tryin' to give myself a little boost of excitement and confidence. Though, I'm sure the last time I was this drunk, I was seen in much less.
Why don't you come over here and make me?
Well... I'm already too far into it... yeah, I'm still drinkin'!
I'll be alright. Though if someone's willin' to do a quick pick em up...
It's just a joke. I'd watch your own hubris, too, hothead. This ain't over just yet...
That's a real nice offer... Guess I'll take you up on that, Sei.
Haha. I'm still partial to booze, myself, but it's close...
Trust me. If your enemy catches an eyeful of these things, then you can consider the fight already won.
That depends, Sei. Do you like your martini's ...dirty?
Y'seem alright by me, Akko.
Make 'em hard as steel an' ya got yerself a deal, mate!
Guess I'll call for another drink while you all just... stare at my minge. Haha.
Those're the types you've pegged as mates? Yer an odd little gremlin of a girl, y'know that?
Long as ya got people worth carin' 'bout, ya can think of a thing or two worth gettin' tattoos of.
Just get y'self a minted friend an' try everythin' from the top shelf. Life changin'! I'd offer, but I ain't exactly the type to carry dosh to bars, if ya understand.
